content.raw:
I think it should be off by default for Gazebo 2.2.x since it didn't exist until 2.2.3. 

I'm not sure in which version of 3.x or 4.x it was introduced.

Would that mean that it's off by default in sdf 1.4 and on by default in sdf 1.5?
